titleStmt.title: Album Ducler 1: Castes et professions de l'Inde

repository.orgName: Bibliothèque nationale de France. Département des Manuscrits

msContents.summary: 2nd series of gouache paintings commissioned by Ducler. In this series are found ...

collation.desc: the <emph rend="bold">front cover</emph>. BnF shelfmark sticker on verso.
1 folio = front <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. No foliation. Blank except for BnF old shelfmark on f[1]r.
1 folio = <emph rend="bold">title page</emph>. No foliation. Inserted between f74 and f75 of U1. Verso blank.
204 folios = <emph rend="bold">gouache paintings</emph>. Library Arabic foliation 1-204 in black ink. Parallel original (?) Arabic foliation 1b-204b in pencil.
1 folio = back <emph rend="bold">guard leaf</emph>. No foliation. No foliation. Blank recto verso.

layoutDesc.layout: Black frame divided in two boxes: the upper, larger, box for the gouache painting, the lower, smaller box for bilingual labels (Tamil in Tamil script and French in Latin script).

decoNote.desc: Royal cypher <locus facs="419"><quote>N</quote></locus>, of Napoléon III.

additions.desc: BnF shelfmark sticker (<locus facs="2">front cover, verso</locus>): <quote>INDIEN 743</quote>
<locus facs="419"><quote>BIBLIOTH. IMP</quote></locus>, that is, Bibliothèque Impériale.
Name of binder and date of binding: <locus facs="419"><quote>J. WEBER 1865</quote></locus>.
BnF old shelfmark in black ink (<locus facs="3">f[1]r</locus>): <quote>Ind. 98.</quote>
Stamp (red ink) (u2, <locus facs="153">f[1]r</locus>; in the labels box of every recto folio of U1): <quote>B.R</quote> (below a crown, both in an oval), that is, Bibliothèque Royale.

binding.p: Library binding. With name of the library, title, royal cypher, binder's name and date of binding on the spine.

origin.origDate: See <quote>1831</quote> in the lower right corner of the labels box of every recto folio of U1.

provenance.p: Gouache paintings commissioned by Philippe Étienne Ducler (1778-1840), colonial administrator in Karikal (<placeName xml:lang="ta">Karaikkāl</placeName>). See Burnouf (1832, p. <ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/bpt6k93120f/f85">85</ref>).

acquisition.p: Acquired, July 22nd, 1833, from Ducler (BnF, département des Manuscrits, inventaire 1 = <title>Acquisitions: manuscrits et imprimés documentaires, 1833-1848</title>, no. 95 (2e série).

listBibl.bibl: Burnouf, Eugène (1832). “<ref target="https://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/bpt6k93120f/f84">Rapport fait au Conseil, dans la séance du 2 juillet 1832, sur les collections de manuscrits et de dessins rapportées de l’Inde par M. Ducler, administrateur de Carical, membre de la Société asiatique</ref>.” <title>Journal asiatique</title> 10, p. 84-87. — Report by E. Burnouf & J. B. Eyriès.

Cabaton, Antoine (1912). <title>Catalogue sommaire des manuscrits indiens, indo-chinois & malayo-polynésiens. Bibliothèque nationale. Département des manuscrits.</title> Paris: E. Leroux. — See <ref target="http://gallica.bnf.fr/ark:/12148/btv1b10329763p/f128">p. 109</ref>.
